ModMetaData.name: JecsLite - A RimWorld of Magic
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
This mod is meant to be used as a replacement for the full JecsTools suite when using "A RimWorld of Magic". https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1201382956
It contains the JecsTools components required for RWoM, and nothing else:
AbilityUser AbilityUserAI CompDeflector CompLumbering CompOversizedWeapon
Please note that these come directly from JecsTools without modification. With this you'll at least be running a little lighter - no need to load a bunch of code you aren't going to use anyway.
JecsTools (MIT License) https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=932008009 https://github.com/jecrell/JecsTools
Thanks to Jecrell for JecsTools, Torann for A RimWorld of Magic, and to Roque the Rogue for testing.
FAQ:
Q: RWoM reports JecsTools not found, why? A: You can ignore that; RWoM looks for the full JecsTools. This mod provides all the JecsTools components required by RWoM.
Q: Does this mod replace Hugslib as well? A: No.
Q: Are these components updated/optimized/improved? A: No. They come directly from the 1.5 version of JecsTools.
Q: Can you fix x, y, and z? A: No. This is simply a replacement for the full JecsTools as a pre-req for A RimWorld of Magic. You should contact Torann regarding issues with RWoM. Any existing issues in the JecsTools code will remain as I source directly from the 1.5 version of that mod.
